product_name: North San Francisco Bay and Wine Country Bicycle Touring Map
long_description: This map offers the best bicycle touring routes in Marin, Napa and southern Sonoma Counties with specialized information for fun cycling adventures. Explore the wineries, redwood forests, rolling hills and rugged seacoast by bike. Features important tourist information, including towns with bicycle shops, hiker/biker campgrounds, bicycle-transit connections and hostel locations. Lists places to buy groceries, restaurants, points of interest, historical sites, restroom locations, tourism offices, drinking water stops and more. Geographical information is presented with color-coded shading, along with a road guide indexed to traffic volumes and hill gradients. Wineries that are open for tasting or tours are marked on the map. Paper, 18 x 36 inches, full-color, double-sided. Scale: 1:110,000; detailed inset maps at 1:55,000. Krebs Cycling; copyright 1999.
short_description: This map offers the best bicycle touring routes in Marin, Napa and southern Sonoma Counties with specialized information for fun cycling adventures.
